item.description:
This is the big one, quite literally. Begin with a block party on South Water Street at noon featuring a performance stage, beer garden, food trucks and other good stuff.

Then move on to Downtown for the parade (beginning at sundown), whose floats and atmosphere rivals anything seen anywhere else.

The party doesn't stop, with tons of stuff going on at Downtown establishments.

Since there's so much going on, there's no single plan of action.

But feel free to use the comments to coordinate and/or discuss the event.

More info here:

http://www.prideri.com/?p=1073

http://www.facebook.com/PrideRI

twitter.com/pride_ri
item.name: RI Pridefest and Parade
